price: Unabahe urugero rw’abantu bo mu mudugudu (wa Antakiya)[1] ubwo Intumwa zabageragaho.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: [1]  Antakiya kuri ubu ni mu gihugu cya Turukiya.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
